fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Spirit Head or Spirit Killing will always spawn.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill until all Spirit Head and Spirit Killing roles die.
- Spirits have the following values and attributes depending on the night:
Night 1: Unstoppable attack, Powerful defense to all members, Detection immunity to all members, non-killing roles may use their ability twice.
Night 2: Unstoppable attack, Basic defense to all members, Detection immunity to all members, non-killing roles may use their ability twice.
Night 3: Powerful attack, Basic defense to Spirit Head, Detection immunity to all members
Night 4: Powerful attack, Basic defense to Spirit Head, Detection immunity to Spirit head
Night 5: Basic attack, no defense
Night 6: Basic attack, no defense, Spirit chat will close and be rendered unusable
Night 7+: Basic attack, no defense, Spirit members must survive to win and any Spirit roles that are already dead lose instantly

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eradicate the living who you seek revenge of. / Eradicate the living who you seek revenge of whilst keeping yourself in your undead form.
